title: Item Sets Disappeared
body: I recently saw all my item sets gone from my account and was wondering why. I know they are saved by account as of patch 5.23 but was wondering if this could be fixed any way. I had 20+ item sets and would prefer not to put each of them in again.

replies.body:
If they're not showing up, then it's likely they became corrupt and are gone for good. :(

If you create a new item set, does it show up in game?
